title: Rugby World Cup 2019 fixtures and results: Every score so far, plus group matches and quarter-final dates
text:
The 2019 Rugby World Cup is now well underway as teams finalise their places in the quarter-finals. However, Typhoon Hagibis has forced the cancellation of at least two games and could have a huge say in who goes through to the last eight.

Here is the full list of fixtures for the 20 countries competing, along with the results of the tournament so far.

Where is the tournament being held?

Japan. See the full list of stadiums hosting the games.

What are the latest standings?

Here's a basic run-down of how the tournament format works:

The opening group stage of the competition sees 20 teams attempt to battle their way out of four Pools - A, B, C and D. Each Pool contains five teams and only two can advance into the knockout rounds.

From there it is standard quarter-final, semi-final, final format.
description: The 2019 Rugby World Cup is now well underway as teams finalise their places in the quarter-finals.
